In a message dated 8/15/2002 7:42:25 AM Pacific Daylight Time,

> >The country was
> >Christian already, where was the need for such a thing?

All right: The racist and sexist white European male part of the country
which was expropriated from the natives and built on the backs of slaves was
already Christian.

How's that? : )

Bob
